column3: â€œThe flavor is unbelievable. Its like smoking a Mango that's been blessed with OG Kush's potency but its sweet as an apricot in August. This strain is very delightful and fulfilling. It scores big in taste, it slam dunks with power,  and the medical benefits are a homerun! This is a very social strain, and women love its fruity smell and flavor. It takes two too Mango Tango so let's cut a bud. I recommend trying this ...â€

â€œI'd probably give this one a 4.5. Super fun, silly and uplifting. Talkative and social. Smoked this one with friends and can't wait for it to show up and my dispensary. Zero paranoia and fairly energetic. Smoked all night and never got too high or too tired. Would definitely buy again. Feels like Bruce Banner euphoria with Jack Herer body high and focus.â€
â€œVery unique flavor that lasts throughout the whole bowl and a really mellow relaxed highâ€

â€œMango Tango Shatter/Bud
Looks: The buds were big and dense with lots of yellow hairs. OGish yet differnt at the same time. Tons of thick white trichs cover its green and yellow colors like fur.
The shatter where tiny tan squares completly solid and stable,but cut like butter,very nice quality.
Smell/Taste: Always hoped to get bud/shatter combo to compare. The buds smell of a strong tropical ctirus mango with a strong...â€

â€œAm I the only one still reading strain reviews in 2018!? Lol all I ever see is old reviews... anyways, just rolled this mango tango in a delish mango swisher and I am feeling amazing!! Body is relaxed and I'm in a good mood even after a long day. Smell and taste are on point. As far as the head high..... I read strain reviews all the time; they have led me to some awesome bud and I always feel like a shitty friend be...â€
â€œgreat strain for emptying the bowels. lit this sucker up while sitting on the rim and boy can I say I've never felt emptier.â€

â€œGreat strain but messes with my ptsd.   Makes me irritable.
 Would recommend to others without ptsd. Great taste and smell.â€
â€œawesome fir fibromyalgia,chronic pain and nausea.â€

â€œDefinitely one of my favorite hybrids. I bought 1/8 and the batch came out to 21.9% THC. Upon opening the bottle, my nose was filled with a very smooth, relaxing smell of Mango. It did not have a citrus or sour smell but rather a sweet, calm mango smell. The buds that I got were HUGE. Though the smell is sweet, calm and smooth, don't let that fool you. This strain REALLY packs a punch and if you hit it too hard, you ...â€
â€œgreat flavor, good high , great medicineâ€

â€œGreat taste and THC % but being a smoker for almost 20 years, this strain may have made me the most paranoid and anxious I've ever been. Just riding in a car made me incredibly anxious for some reason and it happened a couple times only from this strain. I usually don't have a ceiling for getting high but man these buds made think twice about take too big of a rip. Enjoy! ğŸ˜€â€
â€œGreat body high with smiles.â€

â€œAmazing! I smoked a full bowl of mango kush and a ball of wax mango tango in one hit! I really died from coughing and fell asleep. The label said sativa dominant but I got a very euphoric body high and a pleasant head high from that entire bowl.

(Thank god my bong has double percolation!)â€

â€œThe Toke & Vape: Looked pretty thin for a tested 28% upon inhale, theres fruit, and flower, when exhaling i am hit with a punch of diesel toward the tail end. 
Bud structure & Look: Very small some about the size of a dime popcorn buds.  
Smell: Fruity with floral and skunk undertones. Very fluffy when squeezed that release really nice strawberry and plum lime terpenes.
The Effect & Cause: I notice it captures the li...â€
â€œI gave this 5 stars and I am picky with my bud. I was looking for an uplifting, talkative strain that made me relaxed at the same time. This is it! I will be purchasing this often.â€
â€œTested at 26% shit is fire.  You can definitely feel the hybrid of this strain.  I am surprised that there is not more reviews.â€
â€œI like this one. Super smooth to smoke. I felt carefree and happy then super relaxed. Felt like valiumâ€

â€œdon't know why this was a cup winner not focused enough very anxiety prone strain. not the strongest but very loud pleasant taste and smell. it is an okay strain just not for me to medicate with in the regularâ€

â€œHoly moly mango, this indica-heavy hybrid holds true to its name!

The taste bears an uncanny resemblance to raw, juicy mango on the inhale; the exhale yields a sweet tree sap like taste, commonly found in indicas.

Light doses deliver a body heavy functional high. Heavy doses expose the sativa inheritance and indica dominance working in tandem, making it easy to really deliver an intense mind/body high. 

Great for ...â€

â€œIn 2015 this strain was the winner of the overall Southern California Cannabis Cup. Smell & taste was a pungent citrus pine. Buds were lighter green with lots of amber hairs. The buds were caked in a fine layer of milky white crystal trichomes & the THC level was 23%. Made me happy, really relaxed, & mildly sleepy. Light it up!!â€
â€œThe smell is an earthy mango, the fluff to dense ratio is pretty even. The flower burns slowly, so you have a chance to smoke it. Overall a nice high of even head high and body high.â€

â€œVery Lovely. Mango Tango makes you feel like Mango Tango! HeHe :-)

5/5

AMAZING STUFF!!!â€
â€œVery good concentrate. The effects are really in the name; yields great uplifting mood and really creative, positive thoughts.â€

â€œLovely and potent hybrid that leans more towards a sativa spectrum.

Social and energetic high, somewhat toned downed. A reminding light uplifting feeling. Perfect for a long walk.

MangoTango has never been a source for inspiration to me. My creativity is very low and it hurts my ability to work as I work with Math and programming a lot.

The flavour is very rich and has a well balanced citrus taste. More of a typic...â€

â€œTaste: reminded me of when I used to puff on those peach optimos blunts. 
High: very relaxing and long lasting. 
Medicinal: yes. Very relaxing helping with pain and insomnia. 

If your looking for flavor, I HIGHly recommend this one.â€
â€œMade my body feel relaxed, but made me the most paranoid Iâ€™ve ever been.â€

â€œIts great. While I could stop there, I will add a few other things.
It makes me uplifted, happy and talkative.
Makes my eyes and mouth a little dry but not bad.
Smokes real easy and has a sweet taste.
When I smoke by myself, I find myself singing a bunch of songs, even ones I dont like.â€
â€œGreat intense and powerful but a little to much of a body high couch lock for my taste more of an indica. Atleast it feels that wayâ€

â€œCouch lock is too serious on this one. Smoked 16 blunts and remember absaloutly nothing. Dense nugzzzzzzz, great smell, fruity taste, dank shit. Definitely Nugzzzzzzzzzz certifiedğŸ’¯ Would recommend highlyâ€
â€œI was made to think this was sativa dominant .. But this is terrible for day time use! Total couch lock bordering on anxious... GREAT HIGH THOUGH if you are looking to get messed upâ€

â€œbeautiful aromatic buds full of trichomey heaven. very light smoke, kinda better to smoke out of a pipe due to stickiness when it rolls smoke hardly gets through as it Burns very slow. love it! Perfect for headaches!!  instant relief. Grade A Medicineâ€

â€œExcellent bud structure with a true OG aroma that smells somewhat sweet. You get notes of melon and mango mixed with an array of citrus fruits. Good uplifting effects with no sleepiness attached.â€

â€œThis strain tastes EXACTLY like a mango mixed with orange or peach. And the potency was right there with it. In my top 10 buds of all time in my opinion! I get more of the sativa feeling from it. Even though I'm more of an indica guy, I enjoy it just as much ğŸ‘ğŸ»â€

â€œOverall a nice fruity taste, solid looking finished buds, great in and outflow, smooth, smoked well=cured well(Harvested in DEcember for February Sale, that's a good sign) Not as a heavy hitter but more operable strain for the daylight ramblings or errand moments.  Doesn't knock you out, probably batting in the 18-20%THC range.  Was good, and only say that because great" is reserved for the prima reservas we find in...â€"
â€œGreat uplifting head high and wats nice about this strain is that there is little to none paranoia great strain ğŸ‘ğŸ»ğŸ‘ğŸ» 2 thumbs upâ€

â€œTastes Like an orange and mango smoothie. Very tastie and sweet. You can definitely tell its a hybrid; it's an instant high with both Sativa and Indica highs combined in one.

Good for Pain, stress, depression.

5/5â€

â€œI was breaking it down and it smelled extremely good like you just picked mangos off a tree ğŸ˜‚ it got me so high that I just kicked my dog cause I was to happy and it kept barking and annoying me , all around a good strain !â€
â€œYou definitely feel relax, and ready to do whatever.â€
â€œGood strain for soreness and pain. A little too indica for me, had me on my couch alot this past weekend.â€
â€œcrossed my eyes, dotted my teas, smoke this tree if you see itâ€
â€œSolid all around strain!â€
â€œBLORTZ MOON TANGERINE DREAM PEACHES & GLIMMER...JERRY BLANK TURKEY HOOPS...CHILLIN WAVY POOPS...PSY GROOVIN...AHO...Yâ€
â€œI like it alot, It made me feel like a mellow long haired leaping gnome..â€
â€œGreat strain it is a must tryâ€
â€œGreat strain. Arizona natural selections is the best dispensary very knowledgable of their medicine.â€
â€œJust do it man. Won't regret it ğŸ‘ŒğŸ‘ŒğŸ‘Œâ€

â€œHonestly a great strain and beautifully composed. Has a fruitful taste on exhale.â€
â€œSmells amazing, very fluffy and hairs all over bud very sweet best strain I have seen yetâ€
â€œThis hybrid well give you a nice chill feel without too much couch lock.â€

â€œThis is by far my favorite strain. I'm not sure why it's listed as a Hybrid 'cause I was told it was straight Indica and I've never once got paranoid while smoking this strain.. I have anxiety/panic attacks so just seeing paranoid" on the top of the negative side effects makes me go hmm only negatives I've ever experienced thus far and I've been smoking this strain alone for the last month is dry eyes / dry mouth. I...â€"
â€œUnbelieveable flavor. helps have a relaxing nice evening with family after a long day at work. Still keeps uour mimd clear to handle everyday tasks.â€
â€œThis is what you want in a hybrid...not too sedating not too heavy a head buzz. I like this for a long social evening as you can smoke quite a bit without a hangover.â€
â€œThis is a newer one to me, but I can see why it won an award. A perfectly balanced uplifted/relaxed high, with a tart, sweet taste. Good for sleep too!â€

â€œThe Tangie influence is very obvious in the flavor profile of this bud, with the True OG providing interesting undertones. The combination surpasses Tangie in terms of flavor for me. Very enjoyable.â€

â€œVery relaxing effects.  For a sativa dominant strain, I was not expecting this.  It is not really couch lock, but it is more mellowing like an indica dominant.  Absolutely no anxiety or paranoia.  I'd say better for nighttime use rather than day use...unless it a day without needing to be motivated!  Really easy and tasty to vape.  One of my new favs.â€

â€œthis is an interesting strain to say the least smell and tastes exactly as the name sounds its like a party of mangos the high was pretty equally split between stativa and indica. overall i did enjoy mango tango but id probably only pick up in small doses as kind of like a fun weekend strainâ€
â€œSuper fruity smell and taste, the best beyond I've come acrossâ€

â€œTried this strain for the first time and found it to be mid range which for the $ is kool. This is a way to experience a lot of strains. Suffering from a massive stroke and the residuals associated with the stroke so relief is a must. Try it the taste pretty good, I will get again.â€

â€œdabbing some mango tango butter right now. super kushie with fruity under tones. 
smells and taste pretty good but for me not a big fan of the high. its kinda edgy and uncomfortable every time I try itâ€

â€œWalked 5 miles to see what 2015 hybrid champs like. Got served by a coupe lionesses, one love, rolled up, lit it and as if someone just jammed a handful of berries in my mouth. This baby is a creeper with a really nice entrance when the high starts settling in. Clear visual, great for glaucoma and pain mild euphoria burns smooth and even on a windy day you can still smell the fruitness from far...â€
â€œThis stain is very uplifting and energetic, smells and tastes great! In my opinion, one of AZ Natural Selections best options.â€
â€œSuper relaxing smoke. Perfect for after a hard day.â€
â€œHas a slight mango taste and it's so good !! I recommend it!!(:â€
